RelatedSentence: A former NTV reporter has put KTN 's Linda Oguttu on the spot over the anchor 's recent move to introduce her baby girl live on air on her return to TV .
Albert Gachiri reckons that the ravishing Linda , wasted precious time trying to show her baby to the world .
Albert Gachiri reckons that the ravishing Linda , wasted precious time trying to show her baby to the world .
Albert Gachiri reckons that the ravishing Linda , wasted precious time trying to show her baby to the world .
On his blog , Journalism Dry Cleaner ,  the renowned journalist described motherhood as a private affair that most people are not interested in .
A newly - born baby is a source of so much joy and cause for celebration .
Words can not even adequately express the motherhood phenomenon .
